trigger.expression: ({iregexp(On)}=0) and ({iregexp(null)}=0 and {iregexp(no batch file yet)}=0 and {str(0)}=0)
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Indicating is powered off

trigger.expression: ({iregexp(On)}=0) and ({iregexp(null,#3)}=0 and {iregexp(no batch file yet,#3)}=0 and {str(0)}=0)
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Indicating is powered off

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},Reading,{#THERMAL}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},UpperThresholdNonCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},UpperThresholdNonCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#NAME} RPM is high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},Reading,{#THERMAL}].last()}<={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},LowerThresholdCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Fans,{#NAME},LowerThresholdCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#NAME} RPM is low at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {iregexp(OK,#3)}=0 and {iregexp(null,#3)}=0 and {iregexp(no batch file yet,#3)}=0 and {iregexp(0,#3)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: Power {#NAME} is not Healthy

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is extremely high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}<={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdCritical,{#POWER}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is extremely low at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},ReadingVolts,{#POWER}].last()}<={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdNonCritical,{#POWER}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Power.json,Voltages,{#NAME},LowerThresholdNonCritical,{#POWER}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Voltage {#NAME} is pretty low at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},ReadingCelsius,{#THERMAL}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature {#NAME} is extremely high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},ReadingCelsius,{#THERMAL}].last()}>={Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdNonCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()} and {Template Hw Gagarin Redfish LLD:g-redfish-reader[{HOST.IP}-Thermal.json,Temperatures,{#NAME},UpperThresholdNonCritical,{#THERMAL}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.name: Temperature {#NAME} is pretty high at {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
